Text: Ok scratch that.  Windows Media Player is causing it to come out of sync if you sift through the movie.  Watching it with Divx Player had no problems.
This torrent is being watched by at least Comcast, probably more ISPs. Just a heads up.
Somethings wrong with the audio. Voice only comes out of one ear. Every other movie works fine. I had to pull my 3.5m out a little to get voice in both ears.

Audio error! Voice audio (not other sounds) only comes out of the right channel. The partial jack pull out works only because that turns the audio into mono, which can be done by changing the settings on the video player.

So this film doesn't have 6 channel audio, i'd say it's more like 1 channel.
